MTUT.original: ~s~Health and armor are placed around the area in the same way as weapons.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Health and armor are placed around the area in the same way as weapons.

MTUT.original: ~s~Pick up the health.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Pick up the health.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Games from the Multiplayer menu on your phone.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Games from the Multiplayer menu on your phone.

MTUT.original: ~s~Weapons are placed around the area - their locations are represented on your radar by icons.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Weapons are placed around the area - their locations are represented on your radar by icons.

MTUT.original: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_DOWN~ while locked on to a target to focus your aim on his head.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_DOWN~ while locked on to a target to focus your aim on his head.

MTUT.original: ~s~View the current cash scores.
MTUT.translated: ~s~View the current cash scores.

MTUT.original: ~s~You can set up the appearance of your multiplayer character on the Player Model screen.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You can set up the appearance of your multiplayer character on the Player Model screen.

MTUT.original: ~s~In a free-for-all deathmatch game your objective is to kill all other players while surviving for as long as possible.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In a free-for-all deathmatch game your objective is to kill all other players while surviving for as long as possible.

MTUT.original: ~s~Shoot the car's tires to make it more difficult to drive.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Shoot the car's tires to make it more difficult to drive.

MTUT.original: ~s~Leave the game to complete the tutorial.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Leave the game to complete the tutorial.

MTUT.original: ~s~If you are the host you will be able to change a variety of options such as weapon types, game duration, and auto-aim.
MTUT.translated: ~s~If you are the host you will be able to change a variety of options such as weapon types, game duration, and auto-aim.

MTUT.original: ~s~You can gain an advantage by aiming carefully. Headshots will cause extra damage.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You can gain an advantage by aiming carefully. Headshots will cause extra damage.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Player Match from the Multiplayer menu on your phone.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Player Match from the Multiplayer menu on your phone.

MTUT.original: ~s~While riding as a passenger you can perform drivebys. Use ~INPUT_AIM~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to aim. Press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to fire.
MTUT.translated: ~s~While riding as a passenger you can perform drivebys. Use ~INPUT_AIM~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to aim. Press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to fire.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Menu.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Menu.

MTUT.original: ~s~You must remain on Charge Island to complete the multiplayer tutorial.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You must remain on Charge Island to complete the multiplayer tutorial.

MTUT.original: ~s~While riding as a passenger you can also drop grenades from your window. Hold ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to pull the pin, and release to drop the grenade.
MTUT.translated: ~s~While riding as a passenger you can also drop grenades from your window. Hold ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to pull the pin, and release to drop the grenade.

MTUT.original: ~s~If the auto-aim option is set to disallow, you cannot use the targeting system to lock onto opponents.
MTUT.translated: ~s~If the auto-aim option is set to disallow, you cannot use the targeting system to lock onto opponents.

MTUT.original: ~s~The player with the highest score when the game ends is the winner. In a timed game, the remaining time will be displayed in the top right of the screen.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The player with the highest score when the game ends is the winner. In a timed game, the remaining time will be displayed in the top right of the screen.

MTUT.original: ~s~Your opponents are also represented on the radar by icons. Each has a unique color.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Your opponents are also represented on the radar by icons. Each has a unique color.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Leave Game from the phone menu.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Leave Game from the phone menu.

MTUT.original: ~s~The dollar amount in the bottom left of the screen represents the total cash you have earned in ranked games.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The dollar amount in the bottom left of the screen represents the total cash you have earned in ranked games.

MTUT.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_HEADLIGHT~ to cycle through weapons while in a car.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_HEADLIGHT~ to cycle through weapons while in a car.

MTUT.original: ~s~When you are killed, you will spawn in a position close to the action.
MTUT.translated: ~s~When you are killed, you will spawn in a position close to the action.

MTUT.original: ~s~You can start multiplayer games through the phone.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You can start multiplayer games through the phone.

MTUT.original: ~s~When free aiming at a target, your first shot will be most accurate.
MTUT.translated: ~s~When free aiming at a target, your first shot will be most accurate.

MTUT.original: ~s~Once you join or start a multiplayer game you will enter the lobby screen.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Once you join or start a multiplayer game you will enter the lobby screen.

MTUT.original: ~s~You can leave a game at any time using your phone.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You can leave a game at any time using your phone.

MTUT.original: ~s~Using the environment and powerful weapons, in the way this player is, will give you the advantage in combat.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Using the environment and powerful weapons, in the way this player is, will give you the advantage in combat.

MTUT.original: ~s~The lobby screen displays both the game mode and its rules, and also has options that you can alter.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The lobby screen displays both the game mode and its rules, and also has options that you can alter.

MTUT.original: ~s~In a multiplayer game you will automatically run when moving. Use ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to sprint.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In a multiplayer game you will automatically run when moving. Use ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to sprint.

MTUT.original: ~s~At the end of the game the score screen will appear. This represents your deaths, your kills and how much cash you have earned.
MTUT.translated: ~s~At the end of the game the score screen will appear. This represents your deaths, your kills and how much cash you have earned.

MTUT.original: ~s~Use ~INPUT_AIM~ to aim at a target.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Use ~INPUT_AIM~ to aim at a target.

MTUT.original: ~s~You can drive, or ride as a passenger, in a vehicle with your teammates.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You can drive, or ride as a passenger, in a vehicle with your teammates.

MTUT.original: ~s~You can identify opponents by the name displayed above their head. The dot next to the name will flash when they are taking damage.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You can identify opponents by the name displayed above their head. The dot next to the name will flash when they are taking damage.

MTUT.original: ~s~In other team games, the cash acquired by each team may be divided equally between its members.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In other team games, the cash acquired by each team may be divided equally between its members.

MTUT.original: ~s~The check box denotes when a player is ready.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The check box denotes when a player is ready.

MTUT.original: ~s~You are currently on the orange team.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You are currently on the orange team.

MTUT.original: ~s~In a team game you must work together in order to win. Do not shoot your teammates and do your best to help them out.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In a team game you must work together in order to win. Do not shoot your teammates and do your best to help them out.

MTUT.original: ~s~The ticker in the top left of the screen keeps you updated about what is going on in the game.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The ticker in the top left of the screen keeps you updated about what is going on in the game.

MTUT.original: ~s~Player ranks will only be displayed in ranked games.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Player ranks will only be displayed in ranked games.

MTUT.original: ~s~Go to the ~y~tutorial location.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Go to the ~y~tutorial location.

MTUT.original: ~s~The players' names are listed on the left. To the right of the player's name are symbols.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The players' names are listed on the left. To the right of the player's name are symbols.

MTUT.original: ~s~Take out the enemy team with a driveby.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Take out the enemy team with a driveby.

MTUT.original: ~s~Options are shown on the right of the lobby screen.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Options are shown on the right of the lobby screen.

MTUT.original: ~s~In a Deathmatch game, you will gain cash for killing other players. The scoring rules for each game type will be displayed on its lobby screen.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In a Deathmatch game, you will gain cash for killing other players. The scoring rules for each game type will be displayed on its lobby screen.

MTUT.original: ~s~You were killed by a player using high ground to snipe from.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You were killed by a player using high ground to snipe from.

MTUT.original: ~s~In multiplayer modes, police will not attempt to bust you, they will only attack you.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In multiplayer modes, police will not attempt to bust you, they will only attack you.

MTUT.original: ~s~The crown icon identifies the host. The host is the player who controls the game settings/options and starts the game.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The crown icon identifies the host. The host is the player who controls the game settings/options and starts the game.

MTUT.original: ~s~Do not shoot your teammates.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Do not shoot your teammates.

MTUT.original: ~s~The dollar amount in the bottom left of the screen represents the total cash you have earned in multiplayer games.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The dollar amount in the bottom left of the screen represents the total cash you have earned in multiplayer games.

MTUT.original: ~s~Your rank will increase as you acquire cash in multiplayer games. This unlocks new multiplayer models.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Your rank will increase as you acquire cash in multiplayer games. This unlocks new multiplayer models.

MTUT.original: ~s~The star icon indicates the player's rank as a number between 0 and 10.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The star icon indicates the player's rank as a number between 0 and 10.

MTUT.original: ~s~~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~ bring up phone.
MTUT.translated: ~s~~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~ bring up phone.

MTUT.original: ~s~Weapons, health and armor will always reappear in the same place. Learning where they are located is vital for survival.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Weapons, health and armor will always reappear in the same place. Learning where they are located is vital for survival.

MTUT.original: ~s~Go towards your team.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Go towards your team.

MTUT.original: ~s~When locking onto a target for the first time, if you lightly press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ the reticule will reduce in size. This means your first shot will be very accurate.
MTUT.translated: ~s~When locking onto a target for the first time, if you lightly press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ the reticule will reduce in size. This means your first shot will be very accurate.

MTUT.original: ~s~Your rank will increase as you acquire cash in ranked multiplayer games. This unlocks new multiplayer models.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Your rank will increase as you acquire cash in ranked multiplayer games. This unlocks new multiplayer models.

MTUT.original: ~s~Check the current cash scores at any time by pressing ~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~. This also zooms out the radar.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Check the current cash scores at any time by pressing ~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~. This also zooms out the radar.

MTUT.original: ~s~Access the Player Model screen.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Access the Player Model screen.

MTUT.original: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ while in free aim to focus your aim on his head.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ while in free aim to focus your aim on his head.

MTUT.original: ~s~When all players are ready, the game will launch. The game will also start after a short interval if the host and the majority of players are ready.
MTUT.translated: ~s~When all players are ready, the game will launch. The game will also start after a short interval if the host and the majority of players are ready.

MTUT.original: ~s~Highlight Multiplayer by pressing ~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~, then press ~PAD_A~ to select it.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Highlight Multiplayer by pressing ~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~, then press ~PAD_A~ to select it.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Join Match.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Join Match.

MTUT.original: ~s~Get in the passenger seat of the car.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Get in the passenger seat of the car.

MTUT.original: ~s~Aim for the passengers in the car.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Aim for the passengers in the car.

MTUT.original: ~s~In a multiplayer game you will automatically run when moving. Hold ~PAD_A~ to sprint.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In a multiplayer game you will automatically run when moving. Hold ~PAD_A~ to sprint.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Deathmatch.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Deathmatch.

MTUT.original: ~s~The mic icon indicates whether you have an Xbox 360 Headset attached or not.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The mic icon indicates whether you have an Xbox 360 Headset attached or not.

MTUT.original: ~s~Press ~PAD_RSTICK_NONE~ when aiming to switch between differing levels of zoom.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Press ~PAD_RSTICK_NONE~ when aiming to switch between differing levels of zoom.

MTUT.original: ~s~Activate the menu by pressing ~PAD_A~
MTUT.translated: ~s~Activate the menu by pressing ~PAD_A~

MTUT.original: ~s~In some team games, your appearance will be picked for you. All members of a team will have the same appearance.
MTUT.translated: ~s~In some team games, your appearance will be picked for you. All members of a team will have the same appearance.

MTUT.original: ~s~While riding as a passenger you can perform drivebys. Hold ~INPUT_AIM~ and use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to aim. Press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to fire.
MTUT.translated: ~s~While riding as a passenger you can perform drivebys. Hold ~INPUT_AIM~ and use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to aim. Press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to fire.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Quick Match.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Quick Match.

MTUT.original: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_UP~ while locked on to a target to focus your aim on his head.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_UP~ while locked on to a target to focus your aim on his head.

MTUT.original: ~s~Hold ~PAD_LT~ to lock on to a target.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Hold ~PAD_LT~ to lock on to a target.

MTUT.original: ~s~You can select the area of the city that the game will be played in with the Location option.
MTUT.translated: ~s~You can select the area of the city that the game will be played in with the Location option.

MTUT.original: ~s~The mic icon indicates whether you have a headset or not.
MTUT.translated: ~s~The mic icon indicates whether you have a headset or not.

MTUT.original: ~s~When free aiming or locked onto a target use ~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~ and press ~INPUT_JUMP~ to roll.
MTUT.translated: ~s~When free aiming or locked onto a target use ~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~ and press ~INPUT_JUMP~ to roll.

MTUT.original: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to target while free-aiming.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to target while free-aiming.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Multiplayer.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Multiplayer.

MTUT.original: ~s~Take out all of the opponents.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Take out all of the opponents.

MTUT.original: ~s~Sustained firing of your weapon will cause recoil and bullets will spread inaccurately. The aiming reticule will grow larger to indicate when this is happening.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Sustained firing of your weapon will cause recoil and bullets will spread inaccurately. The aiming reticule will grow larger to indicate when this is happening.

MTUT.original: ~s~Use ~INPUT_MOUSE_WHEEL_UP~ and ~INPUT_MOUSE_WHEEL_DOWN~ when aiming to switch between differing levels of zoom.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Use ~INPUT_MOUSE_WHEEL_UP~ and ~INPUT_MOUSE_WHEEL_DOWN~ when aiming to switch between differing levels of zoom.

MTUT.original: ~s~Your name will be listed as part of your team in the lobby. You can also check the teams by accessing the scoreboard.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Your name will be listed as part of your team in the lobby. You can also check the teams by accessing the scoreboard.

MTUT.original: ~s~Select Player Model from the Multiplayer menu on your phone.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Select Player Model from the Multiplayer menu on your phone.

MTUT.original: ~s~Hold ~PAD_LT~ to free-aim.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Hold ~PAD_LT~ to free-aim.

MTUT.original: ~r~You left Charge Island and canceled the multiplayer tutorial.
MTUT.translated: ~r~You left Charge Island and canceled the multiplayer tutorial.

MTUT.original: ~s~Pick up the weapon.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Pick up the weapon.

MTUT.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_NEXT_WEAPON~ to cycle through weapons while in a car.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_NEXT_WEAPON~ to cycle through weapons while in a car.

MTUT.original: ~s~Many game types - for example, Deathmatch - also have team modes.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Many game types - for example, Deathmatch - also have team modes.

MTUT.original: ~s~Start a Deathmatch game.
MTUT.translated: ~s~Start a Deathmatch game.
